project_descr: Project’s incremental strategy is to organize and bring the informal waste sector into the formal waste management to achieve reduction in UPOPs emissions from two sources: open burning of collected waste and open burning of uncollected waste.

outputs.output_title: Less Burnt for A Clean Earth
outputs.output_descr: Pilot programme on the management and elimination of Persistent Organic Pollutants from agricultural and waste burning in Nigeria
